title: The Rise of Progressive Post-Evangelicals, Jordan Peterson, the Meaning Crisis and Community
description:
This is the second of those videos I paused to post. I'm releasing them in reverse order. I very much see these videos as "on the way" in that my thinking is undeveloped. I'm trying to pull a narrative together. I begin with post-evangelical Trump obsession. Many evangelicals were defectors from the mainline. Now some of the children of fundamentalists are refugees in the Mainline but it won't be enough to save it. 

Julian Young writes about Nietzsche and Kierkegaard and has a fascinating interview from a few years ago where the guy making this series connects the meaning crisis and community. I end with Nathan Jacobs, Rod Dreher and Jordan Peterson which very much seems to be another offshoot branch of this development.
